scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts a man kneeling in prayer, with his hands clasped and eyes raised upwards. He is dressed in a monastic habit. To his left, a table with a vase and a patterned cloth is visible. Behind him, a richly decorated bed and a harp are present. In the background, an angel descends from the sky, carrying a scroll, towards a cityscape with boats on a river. Above the cityscape, a circular medallion contains a bust of Christ. The entire scene is framed by an ornate, decorative arch.
